sec.title: Correction to: Diabetol Metab Syndr (2020) 12:86 https://doi.org/10.1186/s13098-020-00592-6
sec.p: It was highlighted that in the original article, the Funding section statement was incorrect. This Correction article shows the incorrect and correct Funding section statement. The original article has been updated.
This research did not receive any special grant funding.
This study was supported by National Institute for Medical Research Development (NIMAD), Grant No. 971036.

fn.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
